title: No questions asked
creator_credit: Cygnet Guild Communications, Rae Evans, Paul Ferguson and Ronald Dunkley
brief_description: Dramatic step by step portrayal of how an accident really does happen on a building site. Concentrates on one accident, the events leading up to it, the accident itself, and the immediate aftermath. The procedure to be followed when investigating an accident is clearly shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Cygnet Guild Communications, Rae Evans, Paul Ferguson and Ronald Dunkley
